column2: text
Hello! Today I'm here with you because I cannot do my work anymore in my current state.
To start hypnosis, swing your Pendulum !
You have a limited ammount of time to hypnotise your customers !
If this time is up, customers will lose their trust in you and go without paying!
Your Pendulum make this time go slower.
Talk with your customers to keep their trust and find how to hypnotise them !
What's the matter ?
Take a chewing gum.

<size=12><textspeed=10>People<textpause=0.3> keep<textpause=0.3> coming<textpause=0.3> to me<textpause=0.3> asking<textpause=0.6><textspeed=50></size><size=35></voffset><color=red><b><textjump=0.0001|-1|2> FOR<camerashake=5|0.5> CRAP! </textjump>
<textspeed=35>All day long it's a real <textpause=0.4><textspeed=50><size=35><color=red><b><textjump=0.0001|-1|2> Pain In The Ass !
Watch out! Most of your customers will talk to you about useless topics, try to avoid them as much as possible so you won't lose time!
It's up to you to choose the best answers and questions to gain the maximum amount of time!
What kind of requests ?
And that's the problem here ?
A chocolatier complains all the time! A father wants me to solve his family problems! I have to organize school trips. Opticians won't stop bothering me with their stupid problems
Yeah in fact it sounds bothering.
Did you consider moving to a different place ?
I beg you please, hypnotise me so I can finally deal with it! I want to break FREE!
Ok let's start.
<textspeed=5><b><textjump=0.5|2|5><color=blue>Focus </color><textjump=0.5|2|5>on my watch.
Think about something <textspeed=10><textjump=0.5|2|5><b><color=orange>chill.
Like <b><color=red>what</color> ?
Honey.
Administrative papers.
<textjump=0.25|2|5><b><color=orange> Oh honey! </color> I love </color><color=orange>honey!
NO! Anything but WORK please!
I'll think about <textspeed=5><color=orange><textjump=0.1|-1|2>honey</color><textspeed=15> instead.
Now think about <color=orange>somewhere you can relax to</color>.
I'm sorry I can't think of anything. Any idea?
Like in a bakery<textpause=0.5> or at a chocolatier.
Under a tree.
<textjump=0.1|-1|2><color=blue>NO PLEASE!</color></textjump> Not those chocolatier's stories again. I'll think of something else instead.
<playsound=Foret>In the woods,<textpause=0.5><color=orange> under a tree</color>,<textpause=0.5> away from my problems.
Oh yeah, i feel <textjump=0.1|-1|2><color=orange>relaxed now.
Finally, try to remember a good memory from your childhood.
Such as ?
<textjump=0.25|2|5>A school trip!
<textjump=0.25|2|5>A birthday party!
A school trip? <textpause=1> With all its organisation? <textspeed=8> No It's making me think about work.
You don't listen to me and you don't understand me at all.You are nothing but a scammer!
Oh! It works, I feel <textjump>floating!.
At my signal, all your problems will appear insignificant to you. NOW!
<i>Congratulations ! You are now a real psycho-hypnotist!
<i>Do anything in your power to make the world a better place!
